S06bsu051_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane' nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
S06bsu051_u:6: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
S06bsu051_u:7_0: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
S06bsu051_u:7_1: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya
S06bsu051_u:8: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman /
S06bsu051_u:9: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan // 1 //
S06bsu051_u:10: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:11_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu051_u:11_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:13: yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06bsu051_u:14: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā /
S06bsu051_u:15: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam?
S06bsu051_u:16: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:22: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu051_u:23: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te - yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam /
S06bsu051_u:25_1: - yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā
S06bsu051_u:25_2: vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñino vā,
S06bsu051_u:27: te ca mayā sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:28: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:33: na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:35: (Vajr, Vaidya 76) api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:39: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet /
S06bsu051_u:42: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:43: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
S06bsu051_u:45: bhagavānāha - evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum?
S06bsu051_u:47: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
S06bsu051_u:48: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:49: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet // 4 //
S06bsu051_u:50: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:54: yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
S06bsu051_u:55: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
S06bsu051_u:56: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ // 5 //
S06bsu051_u:58: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:60_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime
S06bsu051_u:60_1: kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ
S06bsu051_u:62: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:64: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:65: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante /
S06bsu051_u:69: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:71: na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06bsu051_u:75: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:77: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:79: sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:87: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:88: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti // 6 //
S06bsu051_u:89: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:92: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu051_u:93: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:101_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:101_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:102: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:104: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:109_0: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:109_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:110: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:113: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06bsu051_u:116: buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:118: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:120: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:124: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:126: sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:129: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:131: sa sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā (Vajr, Vaidya 78)
S06bsu051_u:134: na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:136: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:138: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:140: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:142: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti?
S06bsu051_u:144: nārhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:146: na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'rhannāma /
S06bsu051_u:148: sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:154: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati - arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti /
S06bsu051_u:155: sacenmama bhagavannevaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:156: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
S06bsu051_u:158: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata - samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:160: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ //
S06bsu051_u:161: bhagavānāha - yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06bsu051_u:164: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:166: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:168: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:169: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet?
S06bsu051_u:173: ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:175: na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:177: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:180: subhūtirāha - tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu051_u:185: yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:186: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
S06bsu051_u:188: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:189: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:190: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:192: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
S06bsu051_u:194: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:196: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:197: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ // 12 //
S06bsu051_u:198: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:200: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:206: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:209: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit,
S06bsu051_u:220: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:225: yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
S06bsu051_u:228: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:230: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:238: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:239: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:240: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:245: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye /
S06bsu051_u:246: ye 'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:247: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:250: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:251: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:260: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametat subhūte, evametat /
S06bsu051_u:262: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na (Vajr, Vaidya 81)
S06bsu051_u:266: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate,
S06bsu051_u:269: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā,
S06bsu051_u:273: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
S06bsu051_u:274: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva /
S06bsu051_u:276: sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu051_u:281: abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam /
S06bsu051_u:286: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:294: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate - apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06bsu051_u:296: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S06bsu051_u:300: ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:305: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:307: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo 'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:308: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu051_u:309: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye 'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:310: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo 'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati //
S06bsu051_u:311: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:316: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti // 14 //
S06bsu051_u:317: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:325: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:326: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
S06bsu051_u:328: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:333: sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:335: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S06bsu051_u:337: na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
S06bsu051_u:339: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
S06bsu051_u:341: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:342: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya /
S06bsu051_u:345: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:351: yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni, (Vajr, Vaidya 83)
S06bsu051_u:352: dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:354_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pareṇa paratareṇa caturaśītibuddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan ye mayārāgitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:356: yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:358: yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:360: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:361: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi /
S06bsu051_u:362: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate //
S06bsu051_u:363: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
S06bsu051_u:364: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:367: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:369: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:372: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:373: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:380: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma //
S06bsu051_u:381: (Vajr, Vaidya 84) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:382: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu051_u:383: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:385: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:387: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
S06bsu051_u:388: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:389: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha /
S06bsu051_u:397: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
S06bsu051_u:401: nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:402: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
S06bsu051_u:407: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:408: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yo 'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
S06bsu051_u:412: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti,
S06bsu051_u:415: asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma?
S06bsu051_u:417: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo (Vajr, Vaidya 85) nāma /
S06bsu051_u:418: bhagavānāha - sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:420: tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate - nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
S06bsu051_u:421: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06bsu051_u:424: kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:426: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
S06bsu051_u:428: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:431: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:434: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:437: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:440: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ?
S06bsu051_u:443: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:448: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:456: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:459: cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:465_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:465_1: lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:467: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt?
S06bsu051_u:471: bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaḥkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:473: puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:477: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:481: rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:483: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:490: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti?
S06bsu051_u:491: subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti /
S06bsu051_u:492: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
S06bsu051_u:496: dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate //
S06bsu051_u:497_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate
S06bsu051_u:497_1: 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:499: bhagavānāha - na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:501: sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte sarve te subhūte asattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:503: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:506: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:508: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu051_u:510: (Vajr, Vaidya 87) api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:512: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu051_u:514: kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:516: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:517: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:518: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
S06bsu051_u:519: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:521: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti?
S06bsu051_u:522: na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:525: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo 'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
S06bsu051_u:528: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:530: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:532: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:546: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S06bsu051_u:547: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ /
S06bsu051_u:548: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ // 1 //
S06bsu051_u:549: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:550: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum // 2 // 26 //
S06bsu051_u:551: (Vajr, Vaidya 88) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā?
S06bsu051_u:552: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:554: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt /
S06bsu051_u:555: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet - bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti /
S06bsu051_u:556: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:558: na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ // 27 //
S06bsu051_u:559: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:560: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06bsu051_u:562: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:563: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ?
S06bsu051_u:566: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
S06bsu051_u:571: tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ /
S06bsu051_u:573: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
S06bsu051_u:574: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:575: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet?
S06bsu051_u:600: yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:602: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet?
S06bsu051_u:610: bhagavānāha - evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:614: dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:616: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:617: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
S06bsu051_u:623: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam //
S06bsu051_u:627: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti // 32 //
